description:
Class Visit
Mom and her friends have come to visit Bunji`s class. Today is a moral education class, so maybe they won`t expose their stupidity too much? That`s what they were hoping for, but...
Carry
While Mom listens to the story of a young mom who lives in the neighborhood, she remembers the time when Bunji and Fumi were little. She remembers when she had to carry them around or they wouldn`t sleep...
Deep Fried Chicken Power
Bunji is in the backyard digging, and he kept on digging. That is a sign that he`s not feeling well, so that is when Mom and Dad try to do this and that to get him back, but...
Complicated
Fumi throws her frustration to Mom because she got bullied in class. "Why did she bully me?" As Mom listens to Fumi`s story, she remembers a time when she had something similar happen to her...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Class Visit / Carry / Deep Friend Chicken Power / Complicated
授業参観 / だっこ / からあげ力 / フクザツ
